reference.shortdesc: The video poster specifies the location of a preview image for a video (the "poster").

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The video poster is modeled on the poster attribute used on the HTML5 video element.

section.title: Rendering expectations
section.p: The poster graphic is displayed while the associated video is loading.

div.p: The following attributes are available on this element: , format, href, keyref, and scope.
For this element, the href attribute specifies the URI of the poster resource.
